Hero Section

Hi, my name is

Tim Falk. I build things for the web.

I'm a web development student at TUC Yrkeshögskola, Sweden. I love to create exceptional websites. Continue to explore my portfolio to get to know me even better.

Check out my projects! Check out my projects!

About Heading Section

01. About Me

About Section

About Content Section

Hello! My name is Tim Falk and I love to create projects on the internet. My interest in web development started when I studied technology at Rudbecksgymnasiet, Tidaholm

It was there that I read the courses Programming and Web Development 1, and later on in life rekindled when I chose to study at TUC Yrkeshögskola to finally achieve my dream of becoming a web developer.

During my studies, I've become well acquainted with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and also I'm currently learning C#. I also have experience with APIs and Tailwind CSS, which I've learned about in my free time.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • C#

Experience Heading Section

02. Where I've Worked

Experience Content Section

  • Kyrkogårdsförvaltningen
  • Hagbloms Måleri
  • Skaraborgs Assistans
  • Kyrkogårdsförvaltningen

Cemetery Warden @ Kyrkogårdsförvaltningen Falköping

Mars - September 2023
  • Managed gardening responsibilities at St. Olofs Cemetery, collaborating with colleagues to ensure the maintenance of the premises. Executed diverse tasks, including but not limited to lawn mowing, flower planting, garden watering, and participation in funeral proceedings.
  • Undertook grave-digging responsibilities and aided visitors, addressing their various physical and emotional needs with empathy and professionalism. Acquired a license for operating wheel loaders, facilitating tasks such as the removal of trees, branches, bushes, and the transportation of gravestones.
  • Deepened appreciation for aesthetics and visuals, fostering a passion for excellence. Experienced in handling sensitive situations, particularly in consoling those grieving. Strengthened interpersonal skills and cultivated resilience, laying a foundation for future career opportunities.

Painter @ Hagbloms Måleri Skaraborg

January 2021 - February 2023
  • Successfully completed painter studies, acquiring comprehensive skills in various painting techniques and craftsmanship. Contributed as a key member of one of Skaraborg County's leading construction companies, specializing in the craft. Executed diverse tasks including wall and ceiling painting, plastering, wallpaper and fabric installation as well as spray-painting.
  • Operated predominantly on "accord," emphasizing efficiency to maximize earnings while maintaining a commitment to high-quality work. Cultivated strong organizational skills, demonstrating the ability to adhere to structured plans and timelines. Collaborated effectively within a team environment, ensuring successful project outcomes.
  • Developed proficiency in customer interaction, enhancing communication skills and the ability to bring clients' visions to life. Engaged in the construction of a new residential neighborhood for Götenehus, contributing to the painting of approximately 40 apartments across five distinct buildings.

Personal Assistant @ Skaraborgs Assistans Tidaholm

November 2019 - August 2020
  • Provided dedicated assistance to an individual diagnosed with Duchenne muscular dystrophy, a condition leading to progressive muscle deterioration. Supported the individual in daily activities, encompassing personal hygiene, cleaning, and aiding in both academic and professional pursuits.
  • Assumed responsibility for meal preparation, fostering a comfortable and supportive environment. Engaged in recreational activities, including games, and offered companionship to address the individual's limitations in self-sufficiency.
  • Developed a comprehensive understanding of proper caregiving techniques tailored to the unique challenges presented by Duchenne muscular dystrophy. Found intrinsic reward in significantly contributing to the improvement of the individual's quality of life during the duration of employment.

Cemetery Warden @ Kyrkogårdsförvaltningen Tidaholm

June 2019 - October 2019
  • Collaborated with colleagues in the maintenance of the North Cemetery in Tidaholm, undertaking various gardening tasks such as lawn mowing, flower planting, and garden watering. Engaged in funeral preparations, handling responsibilities that included heavy tool operation, notably edge cutters.
  • Assumed a crucial role in providing support and assistance to visitors during times of grief, emphasizing empathy and sensitivity. Acquired proficiency in heavy lifting, utilizing physical strength to accomplish diverse tasks associated with cemetery maintenance.
  • Developed skills in task completion and time management through assignments delegated by the team leader. Gained valuable insights into the significance of teamwork within a professional environment, recognizing its pivotal role achieving shared objectives.

Work Heading Section

03. Some things I've built

First Work Right Side Section

Featured Project

InCodenito

A project where I created the bathouse page and also the culture and leisure page for a fictional municipality website. This was for a school project where we learned to code as a team given instructions by a customer.

  • VS Code
  • HTML
  • CSS

Work Left Side Section

Featured Project

Memory Game

A project where I created a memory game with all the necessary functions, such as a timer, counter, and a reset button. It was a project for the JavaScript 1 course.

  • VS Code
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript

Second Work Right Side Section

Featured Project

World Wide Web

The first project I ever made, it was for a school project where I was tasked with writing about Internets History, Bill Gates, and about Agile Methodology. For the HTML, CSS and Agile Methodology course.

  • VS Code
  • HTML
  • CSS

Other Noteworthy Projects

Work More Content Section

Stack Overflow Recreation

A project where I put my experience to test and recreated the navbar and footer of Stack Overflow.

  • VS Code
  • HTML
  • CSS

Weather Forecast

A project where I created a Weather Forecast. I did this to get more experienced using APIs.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • API

Calculator

A project where I created a calculator to solve mathematical problems. Did this as a school project.

  • VS Code
  • C#

Grade Calculator

A small project where I created a C# console program to determine what grade a student should get.

  • VS Code
  • C#

Social Security Number

A project where I created a console program to determine if a social security number is valid or if it is faked.

  • VS Code
  • C#
